TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 컨트롤의 및 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 나타냅니다.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> 클래스에서 발생 하는 두 개의 이벤트 처리기 대리자를 정의 합니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> 컨트롤:는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> 이벤트 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> 이벤트. 처리 하는 메서드를 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> 이벤트는는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> 메서드. 처리 하는 메서드를 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> 이벤트는는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> 메서드. 이벤트 데이터에 포함 된 두 경우 모두를 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> 개체입니다.
